from fractions import gcd

cases = int(raw_input())

for i in xrange(cases):
    a, b = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
    if (b == 1):
        print ("Yes")
        continue
    if (a == 1):
        print "No"
        continue
    while True:
        if b == 1:
            print "Yes"
            break
        g = gcd(a, b)
        if g == 1:
            print "No"
            break
        b = b/g
